body_html:
There is no Hardshrink "information" in torch.nn.Non-linear Activations . But I find there is the doc in torch.nn.modules.activation.

Can this solve by add follow part in docs/source/nn.srt？（I am not sure, so ask it before pull 😄 ）

body:
There is no Hardshrink "information" in `torch.nn.Non-linear Activations` . But I find there is the doc in `torch.nn.modules.activation`. 

Can this solve by add follow part in `docs/source/nn.srt`？（I am not sure, so ask it before pull :smile: ）
